```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE,
                      error = FALSE,
                      fig.height = 7,
                      fig.width = 10,
                      collapse = TRUE,
                      cols.print=20)
rm(list = ls(all.names = TRUE))

require(ggplot2)
require(dplyr)
```

```{r esempio}
data <- mtcars %>% select(disp,mpg)
pl <- ggplot(data) + 
  geom_point(aes(disp,mpg))
print (pl)
```
